      • addUniversity

        public int addUniversity(java.lang.String school,
                         java.lang.String state,
                         java.lang.String location,
                         java.lang.String control,
                         int numberOfStudents,
                         double percentFemales,
                         double SATVerbal,
                         double SATMath,
                         double expenses,
                         double percentFinancialAid,
                         int numberOfApplicants,
                         double percentAdmitted,
                         double percentEnrolled,
                         int academicsScale,
                         int socialScale,
                         int qualityOfLifeScale)
        Calls the addUniversity method from DBController.
        Parameters:
        school - is the name of the school
        state - is the state that the school is located
        location - is the type of area in which the school is located (i.e. Suburban, Small-city, ...)
        control - specifies who controls the university (i.e. Public, Private, ...)
        numberOfStudents - is the number of students at this university
        percentFemales - is the percentage of females at this university
        SATVerbal - is the average SAT Verbal score, out of 800, for the students at this university
        SATMath - is the average SAT Math score, out of 800, for the students at this university
        expenses - is the annual tuition for this university
        percentFinancialAid - is the percentage of students who received some sort of financial aid from this university
        numberOfApplicants - is the number of students who typically apply to this university
        percentAdmitted - is the percentage of students who are admitted annually to this university
        percentEnrolled - is the percentage of students who are currently enrolled at this university
        academicsScale - is an integer between 1 and 5 (5 being the best) indicating the quality of academics at this university
        socialScale - is an integer between 1 and 5 (5 being the best) indicating the quality of the social life at this university
        qualityOfLifeScale - is an integer between 1 and 5 (5 being the best) indicating the overall quality of life at this university
        Returns:
        int the status of adding a university

      • editUniversity

        public int editUniversity(java.lang.String school,
                          java.lang.String state,
                          java.lang.String location,
                          java.lang.String control,
                          int numberOfStudents,
                          double percentFemales,
                          double SATVerbal,
                          double SATMath,
                          double expenses,
                          double percentFinancialAid,
                          int numberOfApplicants,
                          double percentAdmitted,
                          double percentEnrolled,
                          int academicsScale,
                          int socialScale,
                          int qualityOfLifeScale)
        Calls the editUniversity method from DBController
        Parameters:
        school - is the name of the school
        state - is the state that the school is located
        location - is the type of area in which the school is located (i.e. Suburban, Small-city, ...)
        control - specifies who controls the university (i.e. Public, Private, ...)
        numberOfStudents - is the number of students at this university
        percentFemales - is the percentage of females at this university
        SATVerbal - is the average SAT Verbal score, out of 800, for the students at this university
        SATMath - is the average SAT Math score, out of 800, for the students at this university
        expenses - is the annual tuition for this university
        percentFinancialAid - is the percentage of students who received some sort of financial aid from this university
        numberOfApplicants - is the number of students who typically apply to this university
        percentAdmitted - is the percentage of students who are admitted annually to this university
        percentEnrolled - is the percentage of students who are currently enrolled at this university
        academicsScale - is an integer between 1 and 5 (5 being the best) indicating the quality of academics at this university
        socialScale - is an integer between 1 and 5 (5 being the best) indicating the quality of the social life at this university
        qualityOfLifeScale - is an integer between 1 and 5 (5 being the best) indicating the overall quality of life at this university
        Returns:
        int the status of editing a university

      • editUser

        public int editUser(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String firstName,
                    java.lang.String lastName,
                    java.lang.String password,
                    char type,
                    char status)
        Calls the edit user for admin from DBControler
        Parameters:
        username - is the username associated with this account
        firstName - is the first name associated with this account
        lastName - is the last name associated with this account
        password - is the password associated with this account
        type - is the type of this account
        status - is the status of this account
        Returns:
        int the status of editing a user

      • addNewUser

        public int addNewUser(java.lang.String firstName,
                      java.lang.String lastName,
                      java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      char type)
        Calls the createUser method from DBController and passing it the required parameters
        Parameters:
        firstName - is the first name of the new user
        lastName - is the last name of the new user
        username - is the username of the new user
        password - is the password of the new user
        type - is the type of new user
        firstName - is the first name of the new user
        lastName - is the last name of the new user
        username - is the username of the new user
        password - is the password of the new user
        type - is the type of new user
        Returns:
        boolean If the user was added
